name: Word Luchadores
description:
Game Description:
A piñata falls, but instead of spilling out dulces, it spills out multiple words.
Your job is to run as fast as you can and pair two words that will form the strongest weapon. 
But cuidado! Not all words can be paired.
Once you form your weapon you're ready to fight. But remember: The weapon will not last forever.
The last Luchador standing will become THE BEST LUCHADOR in the word!

Developers:
Tal Shenholz - Lead environment artist
Karina Argueta - Lead graphic/UI artist
Kuldeep Bulbule - Lead Character artist
Miguel Atienza - Lead Programmer


*Important Note*
Connect 2 controllers to play with a friend
